name: Gerasimos Isofidou
story: Gerasimos has spent most of his life as a fisherman. He enjoys the early mornings at sea and the peacefulness of the water. He takes pride in his catch and is known for his skill in finding the best spots for fishing. Gerasimos is married to his childhood sweetheart, Maria, and they have three children together. His family means everything to him and he works hard to provide for them.
